Posts.Content: Â hi here is my list of thing Mum has...Fruit or lemonade lollies,sprite,boiled fruit sweets and sherbert lemons to get rid of metallic taste and i also heard frozen pineapple in chunks to suck on and plenty of fluids to flush chemo through the system.Also a cosy blanket as she felt cold round the neck and shoulders but mum did lose her hair.My sis got her echinacea sweets to suck on from heath food shop supposed to prevent a sore mouth,hope this helps and good luck Paula xx
Posts.Title: Suggestions for a chemo survival tool kit please!
